title: Estimating prevalence of rare genetic disease diagnoses using electronic health records in a children's hospital
details: K Herr, P Lu, K Diamreyan, H Xu, E Mendonca… - Human Genetics and …, 2024
abstract: Abstract Rare Genetic Diseases (RGDs) affect a significant number of individuals, particularly in pediatric populations. This study investigates the efficacy of identifying RGD diagnoses through electronic health records (EHR) and natural language …
